issue.title: [CI] Cmake 3.2 nightly build fails

### Original Issue Description:
In the LLVM 8 Migration PR wget was [removed](https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/58ec1bc3984b8453011ba6ca45c727ff6ceed78c#diff-0a4bf63085865017969bbbdac6f66880L29) so the build is [missing](https://github.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/branches/all?query=nightly-2020-03-18-0-circle-test-ubuntu-18.04-cpp-cmake32) wget.
